name: Too Many Bullets (Josep7777, IvanSaMe)
description:
A little game made by college students from ENTI University in Barcelona.

The game itself is a tribute to the bullet hell genre, so we can say that the gameplay consist of playing in a total chaos of bullets and lasers everywhere. 

Different play styles

The player will control a companion with a few powerful abilities that can it be played offensive or defensive depending on the play style of the player.

Original levels

Too Many Bullets is a short game, but every level contains an original mechanic that makes every one unique and difference of the rest.

Hard and frenetic

Hard and frenetic are the words that describe Too Many Bullets. Some levels require a few tries for success.

Controllers

The game is compatible with the keyboard and the Xbox One/PlayStation 4 controllers. We highly recommend the controllers for a better experience.
